body:
This should only take 5 or so minutes! I would appreciate it if we could get as many responses as possible. This form is more for the staff team for now; however, I hope to make some more community related suggestions in future. (I will be discussing with Michael)


If you guys could kindly fill the form out I would be pretty grateful! :)

https://docs.google.com/forms/d/15Np0sX-rb5AAUEW_JHU-j0MEPXNetlAGzyLeYm7rBg4/viewform


If you have any questions just ask below.
